testcase.name: Altering profile information
testcase.system-out: Given a new account has been created........................................passed And I have logged in with the newly created user............................passed When I edit users Firstname as "EditedName" and Lastname to "EditedLastName".passed Then Firstname and Lastname are updated to "EditedName" and "EditedLastName" on the server.passed When I revert Firstname and Lastname........................................passed Then Firstname and Lastname are reverted....................................passed

testcase.name: Create blog post
testcase.system-out: Given a new account has been created........................................passed And I have logged in with the newly created user............................passed When I create a new log post with title "Here in my garage".................passed Then the newly added post is not published..................................passed When I publish the newly added post.........................................passed Then the new test case is published.........................................passed When I delete the newly published blog post.................................passed Then the post is deleted and no longer available............................passed

testcase.classname: Other users Blog Post deleting feature
testcase.name: Delete other users blog post
testcase.system-out: Given a new account has been created........................................passed And I have logged in with the newly created user............................passed When I create a new log post with title "Here in my garage".................passed Then the newly added post is not published..................................passed When I publish the newly added post.........................................passed When I create a non-authorised profile......................................passed And I have logged in with the non-authorised profile........................passed When I fetch other users published blog post................................passed And I delete the blog post as non-author....................................passed Then the post is not deleted................................................passed

testcase.name: Edit other users blog post
testcase.system-out: Given a new account has been created........................................passed And I have logged in with the newly created user............................passed When I create a new log post with title "Here in my garage".................passed Then the newly added post is not published..................................passed When I publish the newly added post.........................................passed When I create a non-authorised profile......................................passed And I have logged in with the non-authorised profile........................passed When I fetch other users published blog post................................passed When I try to edit title of blog post as non-authorised user................passed And I try to edit content of blog post as non-authorised user...............passed Then Content is not changed.................................................passed
